channel.title: Of course another problem
channel.description: i open up compiler, it works, but when i go to open runserver, it says port is already in use. Am i supposed to exit compiler before opening runserver?

item.title: Of course another problem
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ok first make sure your compiler is like

@echo off title [AnyName] "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

When you are and still get it right click on the Run.bat and make sure it says

@echo off title Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar;./Server.jar server
Its possible its saying something else but Im using that.
Do not open any .bat files only your run.bat and see if its still showwing
I remember i had the same problem months ago but i forgot what i did.
I thought that same like here

Read full topic
